original_text: “‘If the offering is a burnt offering from the herd, you are to offer a male without defect. You must present it at the entrance to the tent of meeting so that it will be acceptable to the Lord.
korean_text: 그 예물이 소의 번제이면 흠 없는 수컷으로 회막 문에서 여호와 앞에 기쁘게 받으시도록 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: If the offering is a burnt offering from the herd
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 제물이 소 떼로부터 드리는 번제물이라면

sentences.original_text: you are to offer a male without defect
You must present it at the entrance to the tent of meeting
so that it will be acceptable to the Lord
